title: Westcott 17598 8-Inch Titanium Scissors For Office and Home, Yellow/Gray, 4 Pack
description: Westcott titanium-bonded scissors are lighter, stronger, and sharper than other home, office, and kitchen shears. Durable titanium-bonded blades pair with a corrosion-resistant coating to deliver improved cutting performance. These high-performance titanium-bonded blades are perfect for heavy-duty use like cutting through fabric, boxes, and plastic packages. Designed for left- or right-handed use, Westcott scissors feature soft straight handles for enhanced comfort. Creating your next masterpiece is easy when you have the very best tools to work with. Westcott, the leader in cutting technology, brings you a coordinated assortment of all the essential tools you need to bring your ideas to life
